question_text: Q-2. Do as directed. [18] a cybersecurity system analyzing a dataset of 920 network activities. [07] “#813 Among these, 600 activities are deemed safe, while 320 activities are flagged as potentially malicious. Out of the flagged activities, 180 are correctly identified as malicious, while 140 are incorrectly labeled as safe. Moreover, 480 safe activities are correctly identified, while 120 are mistakenly classified as potentially malicious. Construct a confusion matrix for the given data and compute precision, recall, and F-measure. Clearly outline the formulas used for each metric and present your step-by-step calculations. Consider the following positive data points {(4,1), (4,-1), (6,0} and negative [07] data points {(1,0), (0,1), (0,-1), (-1,0)}. Use linear SVM function to find hyperplane equation. C Discuss the need of normalization. Explain min-max normalization with [04] suitable example.
